title: Low priority que because of bug splats and game crash....??

embed.description: Every game is a story; visit the new League of Legends match history to check out how this one ends and share your own!

body: So I play 4 co-op games in a row because i was getting  disconnection issues in recent games, and i get 0 problems in the co-op games so then I decide to play 1 normal game and I get like 4 bug splats right after champ select and then i just decide to restart client. I do so and it finally lets me reconnect to my game which luckily my team didn't remake so i joined 5 mins into game and everything is fine, untill my whole screen goes black and i cant even get out of the games full screen but i can still hear the game going on behind my black screen. So i am forced to restart my pc to comeback to the game being over and me having a 5 game low priority que.... I had no control of the situation and i get punished with this.... Also my team won the game without me .-.

replies.body:
It sounds like the client could be having problems interacting with your graphics card. This could be caused by drivers that are malfunctioning or windows power settings. As a first step, I recommend checking out the steps in our [Bugsplat Guide](https://support.riotgames.com/hc/en-us/articles/201761974-Bug-Splat-and-Game-Crashes), as the steps inside are likely to resolve this.

Let me know if those steps yielded any progress.
